channel.title: SB 5368 - Alcohol taxes and fees study

item.title: First reading, referred to Labor & Commerce.

item.title: ❓Steve Ewing - Dept. of Revenue
item.description: Steve Ewing signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent Dept. of Revenue.
